sentences.en: Acoustic emission is the characteristic and irreversible sound emitted by a material when it is deformed.
sentences.cn: 声发射是当材料变形时所发出的特殊的不可逆的声响.

sentences.en: Don't start a dispute unless you're prepared to accept irreversible results.
sentences.cn: 除非你准备接受不可挽回的后果,否则不要引起争端.

sentences.en: Ejector seat levers can only be used once, and their consequences are significant and irreversible.
sentences.cn: 弹射座椅操纵杆只能用一次, 它的使用将引起重要的变化,而且这个过程是不可逆的.

sentences.en: Fossil fuels have caused irreversible damage to the environment.
sentences.cn: 矿物燃料已对环境造成了不可挽回的破坏。

sentences.en: He suffered irreversible brain damage in the crash.
sentences.cn: 他在事故中大脑受伤无法治愈.

sentences.en: It would mean a showdown - almost certainly irreversible and final - between them both.
sentences.cn: 那就意味着双方要摊牌 -- 几乎可以肯定将是不可挽回的,是决定性的.

sentences.en: N : Because it causes irreversible damage to the nervous system.
sentences.cn: 因为它对神经系统会可逆的损害.

sentences.en: New economy and globalization have become an irreversible trend.
sentences.cn: 新经济和全球化潮流浩浩荡荡.

sentences.en: She had been in what doctors described as an irreversible vegetative state for five years.
sentences.cn: 她处于医生所说的不可逆性植物人状态已经5年了。

sentences.en: South Africa was going through a period of irreversible change.
sentences.cn: 南非正在经历一场不可逆转的变革。

sentences.en: The most common cause of a total irreversible unilateral loss of hearing is mumps.
sentences.cn: 完全不可逆的一侧听力丧失的最常见原因是流行性腮腺炎.

sentences.en: The process of political change in South Africa has reached the stage where it is irreversible.
sentences.cn: 南非的政治变革已达到不可逆转的地步。

sentences.en: The sustained growth momentum of the Chinese economy is irreversible.
sentences.cn: 中国经济将持续发展已成定势.

sentences.en: This results from the irreversible motion of domain boundaries.
sentences.cn: 这是由于磁畴边界的不可逆运动所致.

sentences.en: When irreversible power controls are fitted however, the stick - fixed condition is closely approximated.
sentences.cn: 然而, 当采用无回力助力操纵时,握杆情况是能够近似实现的.

words.tran_cn: 不可改变的；不能取消的；不能挽回的
不能取消地；不能撤回地
不可逆的；不能取消的；不能翻转的

phrases.tran_cn: 不可逆过程；单向磁化过程

trans.tran_cn: 不可逆的，不能翻转的，不能倒置的，[法]不可取消的
trans.tran_en: irreversible damage, change etc is so serious or so great that you cannot change something back to how it was before
